ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe I am a wood elf who worship Bristlebane, who from all indications doesn t get along with Tunare very well.  I m torn between being accepted in my homeland
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe I am a wood elf who worship Bristlebane, who from all indications
doesn't get along with Tunare very well. I'm torn between being accepted in
my homeland vs pleasing my deity:-)

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 5:42 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling


True. Of course the simpliest way to avoid faction hits in PoG is to NOT
HUNT THERE :) As Rokenn follows Tunare he certainly will not be, and shame
on you wood elves that go there to kill your godess' creations. What are
you Teir'dal or something? haha

My monk on the other hand is only 2 levels a way from smackin around
Tunare's creations, hehe. Must get a silver moon bracer.

Rokenn
